snippet: A challenging task in New York City, where similar apartments a few blocks from one another can have varying values; the same can hold true for homes on different floors and with different views.
abstract: Getting Started column; appraising value of a home can be challenging task in New York City, where similar apartments a few blocks from one another can have varying values; suggestions given for how homeowner or broker can help with appraisal process.
lead_paragraph: A challenging task in New York City, where similar apartments a few blocks from one another can have varying values; the same can hold true for homes on different floors and with different views.

headline.seo: Getting Started – Assessing the Value of a Home
